article.title: EFTA_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: WiktionaryEFTAEFTAis the European Free Trade Association, a European trade bloc which was established as an alternative for European states who did not join the then-European Economic Community.

list.listitem: European Fair Trade Association, an association of eleven fair trade importers in nine European countries
European Free Trade Area, other European trade blocs
European Federation of Taiwanese Associations, which combines several associations by Taiwanese people in each European country
